reviewText: I initially only wanted The Lost Boys... but after some perusing I found that it was being sold in blu-ray as a triple feature - for less $ - so I said why not - besides Cory Feldman is in all three and that works for me.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a great set. Kinda like a lost boys box set that we never got.Dont know why they never made one but this takes its place. The last movie is kinda a disappointment.3 discs for 3 different movies.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This 3-disc set includes The Lost Boys, The Tribe and The Thirst. If only this franchise had been filmed directly after the original but it is great to have 3 Lost Boys films in one collection. Cory Feldman is in all three films (but not Corey Haim). I prefer The Thirst over The Tribe but neither can compare to the original.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I REALLY LOVE THIS TRIPLE FEATURE DEAL! I'M GOING TO BUY MORE.. WELL ACTUALLY I HAVE BOUGHT ANOTHER ONE ALREADY. NOT OF THIS ONE I MEAN OTHER ONES. ANYHOO! I'M SLOWLY TURNING ALL MY REGULAR DVD'S INTO BLU RAY AND IT HELPS SO MUCH MORE TO HAVE THEM LIKE THIS! YOU WOULD NOT BELIEVE HOW MUCH ROOM I'M GETTING BY DOING THIS! AND I LOVE THEY PUT ALL THREE MOVIES ON THEIR OWN DISC AND ANY SPECIAL FEATURES ARE STILL ON WITH THE MOVIE IF THEY CAME WITH ANY! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS MOVIE SET AND ANY OTHERS!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I would recommend to others! I really enjoyed watching them because I like to watch scary movies sometimes. Great Storyline!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This would have gotten 5/5 if not for the other two being on there.  The original is the only good (GREAT) movie of the three pack.  I got it for my daughter because she has a crush on, of all people, Corey Feldman.  I don't even think she cares how bad the movies are, just so long as Feldman is in them.
Title: N/A
